  - [one or more **categorical** predictors (ANOVA)](https://usyd-soles-edu.github.io/cheatsheet-r-anova/){target="_blank"} - `stats`
  - [one or more **numerical** predictors (linear regression)](https://usyd-soles-edu.github.io/cheatsheet-r-regression/){target="_blank"} - `stats`
